Articles.Content:
This is a really simple mod to change the content of the Stock font. For now all it does is loading a new Japanese fallback font to replace the stock one that misses some characters. In the future I plan to expand it make it easy to replace, remove or add fallback fonts (and the main font if it is doable)

KerbalFontProject-1.0.0.0.zip
License
Source

v1: Replace the stock Japanese fallback with a new font that implements all of the Shift JIS encoding.
